Definition.WordDefinition: BEFRIEND, v.t. To make an ingrate.

Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
Befriend \Be*friend"\, v. t. [imp. & p. p. {Befriended}; p. pr. & vb. n. {Befriending}.] To act as a friend to; to favor; to aid, benefit, or countenance. [1913 Webster]
By the darkness befriended. --Longfellow. [1913 Webster]
